title: Deer College Spring Cleaning Event
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]
[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Vast+Shadow&display=swap')
div#container-wrap{
background-image:none;
}
#header{
background:url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/deer-college-spring-cleaning-event/cherryicon.png");
background-repeat:no-repeat;
background-size:110px;
background-position:left;
}
div#extra-div-1{
height: 140px;
width: 100%;
top: 0;
position: absolute;
background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/deer-college-spring-cleaning-event/bannercherry.png");
background-size:cover;
background-position:20% 20%;
}
#login-status{
text-shadow:1px 1px 1px black;
}
#header h1 a {
color:pink;
text-shadow:2px 2px 1px purple, -2px 2px 1px black, -2px -2px 1px black, 2px -2px 1px black;
font-size:36px;
}
#header h2 span::before {
content: "Spring Cleaning Pledge";
color:pink;
text-shadow:2px 2px 1px purple, -2px 2px 1px black, -2px -2px 1px black, 2px -2px 1px black;
font-size:16px;
}
#header h2 span {
font-size:0;
}
#page-title{
color:pink;
text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px black, -1px 1px 1px black, -1px -1px 1px black, 1px -1px 1px black;
text-align:center;
}
.okaywork{
display:flex;
margin-top:-50px;
flex-direction:row;
}
.wayone{
flex:1 1 50%;
padding:10px;
}
.base{
font-family: 'Vast Shadow'; 
font-size: 400%; 
margin: 2px 0 5px;
font-weight:bold;
text-shadow:0px 0px 2px black;
}
.base p{
line-height:1;
margin-block-start:0em;
margin-block-end:0em;
}
.pink{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(255,245,250,1) 50%);
}
.green{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(224,246,235,1) 50%);
}
.cobweb{
color:#98FB98;
}
.junk{
color:#ffb7c5;
}
.greenery{
border:solid 1px #999999; 
background:#f5fffa; 
padding:5px; 
margin-bottom: 10px;
margin-top:60px;
}
.redery{
border:solid 1px #999999; 
background:#fff5fa; 
padding:5px; 
margin-bottom: 10px;
margin-top:60px;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssgreen{
display:none;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssred{
display:none;
}
@media only screen and (max-width:600px){
.wayone{
display:none;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssgreen{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(224,246,235,1) 50%);
padding:10px;
display:block;
}
.magicbecauseiambadatcssred{
background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(255,245,250,1) 50%);
padding:10px;
display:block;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[image flowers.png style="width:100%;box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16) 0px 1px 4px, rgb(51, 51, 51) 0px 0px 0px 3px;"]]
= [[size 80%]]**Hosted by the Discord Critique Staff!**[[/size]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
Greetings, denizens of Deer College, lurkers, critters, and authors alike!

It's Spring, and that means it's time for a good old-fashioned Spring Cleaning!

For the SCP Wiki, we invite everyone to clean up those cobwebs or fix up that junk. You may participate in one of two ways:
[[/=]]
@@ @@
[[div style="display:flex;margin-top:30px;"]]
[[div class="wayone green"]]
[[div class="base cobweb"]]
Way 1:
Cobwebs
[[/div]]
Got something that's collecting dust? Perhaps a draft that fell behind the counter? Or an art piece that's gone untouched?

Select a project that is over 1 year old that you've always wanted to get around to. If you have multiple projects, try donating them to other people who may not have a project of their own. 

You can choose to absolve yourself of the draft completely, or put it up as a collaborative effort. 

During the working period, get that project up to posting quality.

Post it! (Or not, your choice. We're not your parents!)

Discuss what made you want to select this piece for your writing project, how you went about writing it now that you have revisited the concept after some time, etc., all in Deer College with your fellow Spring Cleaners.
[[/div]]
[[div class="wayone pink"]]
[[div class="base junk"]]
Way 2:
Junk
[[/div]]
Sometimes, we got a little something that shows its age. Why not give it a once over and fix it up?

Select a posted piece of yours that you've always wanted to fix up and make better. 

During the working period, you can work on a copy of it in the sandbox.

Post it! (Or update it. Or not! Again, we're not your parents.)

Discuss why you felt this piece needed to be rewritten, your philosophy for doing so, and what you liked about it that originally compelled you to write it in the first place, all in Deer College with your fellow Spring Cleaners.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="magicbecauseiambadatcssgreen"]]
[[div class="base cobweb"]]
Way 1:
Cobwebs
[[/div]]
Got something that's collecting dust? Perhaps a draft that fell behind the counter? Or an art piece that's gone untouched?

Select a project that is over 1 year old that you've always wanted to get around to. If you have multiple projects, try donating them to other people who may not have a project of their own. 

You can choose to absolve yourself of the draft completely, or put it up as a collaborative effort. If you choose to donate a draft as a collaborator, the draft will only count as your submission for awards if you do any work on it past the donation.

During the working period, get that project up to posting quality.

Post it! (Or not, your choice. We're not your parents!)

Discuss what made you want to select this piece for your writing project, how you went about writing it now that you have revisited the concept after some time, etc., all in Deer College with your fellow Spring Cleaners.
[[/div]]
[[div class="magicbecauseiambadatcssred"]]
[[div class="base junk"]]
Way 2:
Junk
[[/div]]
Sometimes, we got a little something that shows its age. Why not give it a once over and fix it up?

Select a posted piece of yours that you've always wanted to fix up and make better. 

During the working period, you can work on a copy of it in the sandbox.

Post it! (Or update it. Or not! Again, we're not your parents.)

Discuss why you felt this piece needed to be rewritten, your philosophy for doing so, and what you liked about it that originally compelled you to write it in the first place, all in Deer College with your fellow Spring Cleaners.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
-----

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **THE DATES**
[[/=]]
-----
**Working Begins:** When this is posted!

**Posting Begins:** March 26th 12:01 AM EST

**Posting Ends:--** April 19th, 12:01 AM EST.-- ##green|**EXTENSION** to May 1st, 12:01 AM EST.##

**Voting Period:** --April 19th, 12:02 AM EST -- April 26th, 12:01 AM EST-- ##green|May 1st, 12:02 AM EST — May 8th, 12:01 AM EST##

[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **RECOGNITION**
[[/=]]
-----
This is not a contest and there isn't a prize, but there is room for recognizing achievements! Collect a badge:
* Draft Archaeologist
* Forum Warrior
* Freshest Paint
* Votes to the Moon
* Why Use Many Word When Few Do Trick?
* Voracious Critter
* MrPurgatorio Mark of Approval
* The Collabest Of Us
* ...and more!
[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **THE GOAL**
[[/=]]
-----
Our goal here is for everyone to revisit an old concept and improve it as best they can. This is your chance to show off your experience (or dunk on the past you). Please keep in mind that this is not a competition, but rather a group exercise for all of us!

No pressure!
[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **THE RULES**
[[/=]]
-----
# Follow the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/site-rules Site Rules.] No exceptions.
# Follow the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/criticism-policy Criticism Policy.] 
# Follow the [https://discord.com/channels/877710488673329162/877718729465671760/1063297988430147664 Discord Server's Rules.]
# This is a Discord Critique Team event so if you would like to participate please join the Official SCP Discord Server (https://discord.gg/scp) and join us in the Deer College writing channels.
# You may only submit __one__ draft/article for each category. This also counts collaborations.
# You may post to the wiki as part of this event at any point between the posting period of this event and the opening of the voting period. 
# You may still post after the posting period has ended, but your article will not be considered a part of this event's running, and won't be considered for badges.
# You are encouraged, but not forced to, comment on other people's efforts to improve. We will be using the Contest tag on the Discord writing channel forums for this to keep track of everything. 
# You are encouraged to highlight individuals who left insightful comments or good advice on how to improve your works.
# If you accept a donated idea, you are required to cite who you got it from as well as note if you used any of their work in your final draft. Whether or not this constitutes co-author credit is something we will leave up to both of your discretions.
# If you co-authored an article with someone, please make sure you request a member of staff to add you and your co-author to the metadata! 
# All draft donations and claims must be put in this sandbox: https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/collab:spring-cleaning. Follow the rules there as well!
# Have fun!
[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **THE ENTRIES**
[[/=]]
-----
[[=]]
++++ ##GREEN|**COBWEB**##

@@ @@
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
-----

-----
[[=]]
++++ **THE REWARDS**
[[/=]]
-----

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **Draft Archaeologist**
Who brought the oldest drafts to work with?

[[*user Crow-cat]] with a draft from 2018

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]

[[div class="redery"]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **THE COLLABEST OF US**
[[image https://i.imgur.com/VxOEkTs.png style="width:50%;"]]
[[*user Lt Flops]] & [[*user Stealth000]]
[[*user Miss Lapis]] & [[*user Strange Matter]]
[[*user Fish^12]] & [[*user Queerious]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **MRPURGATORIO'S MARK OF APPROVAL**
[[image https://i.imgur.com/lY9swNO.png style="width:50%;"]]
Fly's husband has a very picky taste, so this might've been one of the hardest badges to grab! Here are his favourites:

Just [[*user Pedagon]] in general! And also for organising Spring Cleaning and being awesome!!
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-dagons-curriculum-vitae Pedagon's refurbished author page!]  by [[*user Pedagon]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8901 SCP-8901: Colours of Magic] by [[*user Ethagon]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8055 SCP-8055: I had a bad dream] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/just-another-day Just Another Day] by [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]

And his absolute favourite: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/digital-daemon-revival nightfall++: Digital Demon Revival] by [[*user JackalRelated]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **VOTES TO THE MOON**
[[image https://i.imgur.com/hwiJ5u1.png style="width:50%;"]]
Voted to get the most recognition, and read during the stream!

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8055 SCP-8055 I had a bad dream] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]

With honourable mentions to:
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8097 SCP-8097: Ƿ is for the Ƿaylaid Ƿallflower] by [[*user Ihp]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8499 SCP-8499: Echoes of the Barren and Broken] by [[*user Miss Lapis]] & [[*user Strange Matter]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="redery"]]
[[=]]
++++ **THE GOLDEN JACKAL'S GLOCK-19**[[footnote]]This badge is in good humour and made with Jackal's approval.[[/footnote]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/d9GhSpz.png style="width:50%;"]]
The typo in Glock-19 is intentional.

This badge is for all participants who posted before [[*user JackalRelated]] did! You won the secret race!

Congratz on beating our favourite point of mockery to:
[[*user Queerious]] & [[*user CompleteIndie]] & [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]
[[*user PeppersGhost]] & [[*user PoufyPoufson]] & [[*user Tsercele]]
[[*user Ihp]] & [[*user Dr Kira Moto]] & [[*user IvanNavi]]
[[*user Anorrack]] & [[*user Stealth000]] & [[*user Sushimi]]
[[*user Nonaggress]] & [[*user fairydoctor]] & [[*user pedagon]]
[[*user Miss Lapis]] & [[*user Strange Matter]]
[[*user MaddGasserGaton]] & [[*user Ethagon]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="greenery"]]

Special thanks to [[*user Fish^12]] for creating these badges! [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:spring-cleaning-badges Read his thoughts and upvote the art here!]

Thanks to [[*user AstersQuill]], [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] and [[*user Fish^12]] for organising Spring Cleaning, [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] and [[*user Prismal]] for helping behind the scenes to set up the event stream, and to [[*user psychicProgrammer]] and [[*user Corax D]] for joining Fishy and me to host and read the Public Fav! And [[*user UncertaintyCrossing]] for editing of course.

And all love to [[*user Pedagon]]!! All Hail Dinoman.

++ **You can listen to the event [https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/scp-wiki-archives/episodes/Spring-Cleaning-Event-Seminar-e2k1se4 here]!**

~Fly

[[/div]]

**Image 1**
> **Filename:** //flowers.png//
> **Author:** [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]

[[module CSS]]
/* Do not modify, unless u know what are u doing */
.snowflake {
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 1em;
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  text-shadow: 0 0 5px #000;
}

@-webkit-keyframes snowflakes-fall{0%{top:-10%}100%{top:100%}}@-webkit-keyframes snowflakes-shake{0%,100%{-webkit-transform:translateX(0);transform:translateX(0)}50%{-webkit-transform:translateX(80px);transform:translateX(80px)}}@keyframes snowflakes-fall{0%{top:-10%}100%{top:100%}}@keyframes snowflakes-shake{0%,100%{transform:translateX(0)}50%{transform:translateX(80px)}}.snowflake{position:fixed;top:-10%;z-index:9999;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none;cursor:default;-webkit-animation-name:snowflakes-fall,snowflakes-shake;-webkit-animation-duration:10s,3s;-webkit-animation-timing-function:linear,ease-in-out;-webkit-animation-iteration-count:infinite,infinite;-webkit-animation-play-state:running,running;animation-name:snowflakes-fall,snowflakes-shake;animation-duration:10s,3s;animation-timing-function:linear,ease-in-out;animation-iteration-count:infinite,infinite;animation-play-state:running,running}.snowflake:nth-of-type(0){left:1%;-webkit-animation-delay:20s,20s;animation-delay:20s,20s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(1){left:10%;-webkit-animation-delay:21s,21s;animation-delay:21s,21s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(2){left:20%;-webkit-animation-delay:26s,25s;animation-delay:26s,25s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(3){left:30%;-webkit-animation-delay:24s,22s;animation-delay:24s,22s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(4){left:40%;-webkit-animation-delay:22s,22s;animation-delay:22s,22s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(5){left:50%;-webkit-animation-delay:28s,23s;animation-delay:28s,23s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(6){left:60%;-webkit-animation-delay:26s,22s;animation-delay:26s,22s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(7){left:70%;-webkit-animation-delay:22.5s,21s;animation-delay:22.5s,21s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(8){left:80%;-webkit-animation-delay:21s,20s;animation-delay:21s,20s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(9){left:90%;-webkit-animation-delay:23s,21.5s;animation-delay:23s,21.5s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(10){left:25%;-webkit-animation-delay:22s,20s;animation-delay:22s,20s}.snowflake:nth-of-type(11){left:65%;-webkit-animation-delay:24s,22.5s;animation-delay:24s,22.5s}
[[/module]]
